content.en: Algorithmic tissue ablation: Researchers have been exploring the use of computerized algorithms to optimize various techniques for tissue ablation. These algorithms, which can be automated and programmable, are being used to improve the effectiveness of radiofrequency ablation and irreversible electroporation therapy. By utilizing algorithms, scientists are able to optimize parameters, electrode configurations, and pulsing patterns to create larger ablation zones and reduce ablation duration, ultimately improving outcomes for patients.
content.da: Algoritmisk vævsablation: Forskere har udforsket brugen af computeriserede algoritmer til at optimere forskellige teknikker til vævsablation. Disse algoritmer, som kan automatiseres og programmeres, bruges til at forbedre effektiviteten af radiofrekvensablation og irreversibel elektroporationsbehandling. Ved at anvende algoritmer kan forskere optimere parametre, elektrodekonfigurationer og pulsmønstre for at skabe større ablationszoner og reducere ablationstiden, hvilket i sidste ende forbedrer patientresultaterne.
